definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Li4 shi3 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: revision history (of a document, web page etc)

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: They are marching off to gyms and discovering face cream in record numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他们向健身房进军，物色到的面霜数目已创历史新高。

sentences.english: The real war will never get in the books.
sentences.chinese: 真正的战争永远会隐没于历史的黑暗面。

sentences.english: View build history and build status directly in Mingle.
sentences.chinese: 在Mingle中直接观看构建历史与构建状态。

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通过专项整治，再现京城水系和古典园林的历史风貌。

sentences.english: Lotteries have two centuries of history in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的彩票历史已有两个世纪。

sentences.english: The history of those archaeologicalfinds goes back to the 2ndcentury.
sentences.chinese: 这些历史文物的发现可追溯到2世纪。

sentences.english: The Traditional Institutionalism investigated the history regarding institution as the focus.
sentences.chinese: 传统制度主义以制度为中心来考察历史。

sentences.english: This activity has been rooted in China for quite a long time.
sentences.chinese: 遛鸟在中国已经有很长时间的历史了。

sentences.english: Mr. Anderson was writing a book on the history of Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 安得森先生正在写一本关于丹麦历史的书。

sentences.english: Like every paradigm throughout history, at some point or another, things change.
sentences.chinese: 正如历史上所有的范例一样，世事常变，无物永驻。

sentences.english: The Hutongs are full of history.
sentences.chinese: 胡同里充满了历史的痕迹。

sentences.english: "We were discussing the history of Volantis, " Haldon said to him.
sentences.chinese: “我们正在讨论瓦兰提斯的历史，”哈尔顿告诉他。

sentences.english: Mr Qin is our history teacher. He has a wonderful name Qin Han.
sentences.chinese: 秦先生是我们的历史老师，他有一个好听的名字秦汉。

sentences.english: Sheyang Lake was a famous large lake in North Jiangsu in historical period.
sentences.chinese: 射阳湖是苏北历史上著名的大湖。

sentences.english: In this historical process, the development orbit of state of Qin especially has model nature.
sentences.chinese: 在这一历史进程中，秦国的发展轨迹尤其具有典型性。

definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
before the present/(a long period) ago
